text: Ernest Bai Koroma (born 2 October 1953) is a Sierra Leonean politician. He was the fourth President of Sierra Leone from 17 September 2007 to 4 April 2018."Ernest Bai Koroma re-elected as Sierra Leone's President" , English.news.cn, 24 November 2012. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Sierra Leone
title: Ernest Bai Koroma
